function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deployment of IoT tools may lead to privacy concerns due to data collection","Impact":"Violation of privacy and potential misuse of personal health data","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy protocols, educate users on data usage, and obtain consent for data collection","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, and user-access controls","People":"People using the IoT tools, healthcare organizations collecting data","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, IoT tool developers"},{"Description":"Reliance on IoT tools for disease monitoring may lead to false alarms or missed cases","Impact":"Inaccurate disease monitoring and delayed response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and maintenance of IoT devices, cross-verification with traditional monitoring methods","Technologies":"Advanced sensor calibration, machine learning algorithms for data validation","People":"Healthcare professionals, government authorities","Owner":"IoT tool developers, government health departments"},{"Description":"Incorrect interpretation of IoT data may lead to misinformed decision-making","Impact":"Incorrect resource allocation and ineffective control measures","Mitigation":"Training for data interpretation, validation of data with multiple sources, collaboration with disease control experts","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, anomaly detection algorithms, collaboration platforms","People":"Government authorities, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government health departments, IoT tool developers"}]}
